009
010package imagingbook.pub.matching;
011import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
012import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
013import imagingbook.pub.matching.DistanceTransform.Norm;
014
015/**
016 * This class performs chamfer matching on binary images.
017 * @author W. Burger
018 * @version 2021/11/26
019 */
020public class ChamferMatcher {
021        
022        private final int MI, NI;
023        private final float[][] D;                              // distance transform of I
024        private int MR, NR;
025        
026        public ChamferMatcher(ByteProcessor I) {
027                this(I, Norm.L2);
028        }
029        
030        public ChamferMatcher(ByteProcessor I, Norm norm) {
031                this.MI = I.getWidth();
032                this.NI = I.getHeight();
033                this.D = (new DistanceTransform(I, norm)).getDistanceMap();
034        }
035        
036        public float[][] getMatch(ByteProcessor R) {
037                this.MR = R.getWidth();
038                this.NR = R.getHeight();
039//              final int[][] Ra = R.getIntArray();
040                float[][] Q = new float[MI - MR + 1][NI - NR + 1];
041                for (int r = 0; r <= MI - MR; r++) {
042                        for (int s = 0; s <= NI - NR; s++) {
043                                Q[r][s] = getMatchScore(R, r, s);
044                        }       
045                }       
046                return Q;
047        }
048        
049        private float getMatchScore(ByteProcessor R, int r, int s) {
050                float q = 0.0f;
051                for (int i = 0; i < MR; i++) {
052                        for (int j = 0; j < NR; j++) {
053                                if (R.get(i, j) != 0) { // foreground pixel in reference image
054                                        q = q + D[r + i][s + j];
055                                }
056                        }
057                }
058                return q;
059        }       
060
061        private float getMatchScore(int[][] R, int r, int s) {
062                float q = 0.0f;
063                for (int i = 0; i < R.length; i++) {
064                        for (int j = 0; j < R[i].length; j++) {
065                                if (R[i][j] > 0) {      // foreground pixel in reference image
066                                        q = q + D[r + i][s + j];
067                                }
068                        }
069                }
070                return q;
071        }       
072        
073        // unused?:
074        
075        public float[][] getMatch(PntInt[] points, int width, int height) {
076                float[][] Q = new float[width][height];
077                for (int r = 0; r <= width; r++) {
078                        for (int s = 0; s <= height; s++) {
079                                float q = getMatchValue(points, r, s);
080                                Q[r][s] = q;
081                        }       
082                }       
083                return Q;
084        }
085        
086        private float getMatchValue(PntInt[] points, int r, int s) {
087                float q = 0.0f;
088                for (PntInt p : points) {
089                        final int u = r + p.x;
090                        final int v = s + p.y;
091                        if (0 <= u && u < MI && 0 <= v && v < NI) {
092                                q = q + D[u][v];
093                        }
094                }
095                return q;
096        }
097
098}
